analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/1/0x702b1b84bb83bb2c651780bf83ba0cb17c656182.sol:
	Contract IVNToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/1/0x702b1b84bb83bb2c651780bf83ba0cb17c656182.sol#221)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/1/0x702b1b84bb83bb2c651780bf83ba0cb17c656182.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_chucks/1/0x702b1b84bb83bb2c651780bf83ba0cb17c656182.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/1/0x702b1b84bb83bb2c651780bf83ba0cb17c656182.sol#79-80) is not in mixedCase
